title: Kirk Makes A Major Announcement & Michael Imperioli and Steve Schirripa Join To Discuss Their New Book, 'Woke Up This Morning: The Definitive Oral History of The Sopranos'
description:
The show begins with an important announcement from Kirk. Michael Imperioli and Steve Schirripa, authors of 'Woke Up This Morning: The Definitive Oral History of The Sopranos' join Kirk to discuss all things Sopranos & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
